  • Method Details

    • clearSlotFile

      public String clearSlotFile​(int id)
      Clears the slot file with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the slot file to clear.
      Returns:
      The filename of the cleared slot file, or null if the file couldn't be deleted.

    • loadFromDirectory

      public void loadFromDirectory()
      Loads slot files from the slots directory.

    • getSlotFiles

      public List<SlotFile> getSlotFiles()
      Gets the list of slot files.
      Returns:
      The list of slot files.

    • createNewFile

      public void createNewFile​(String fileName) throws IOException
      Creates a new file with the specified filename in the slots directory.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The filename of the new file to create.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while creating the file.
